data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 69 believers in Logar and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Logar, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Logar to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.section_summary: On average, 185 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Logar, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Logar who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Logar, Afghanistan to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Pashtun, Northern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Pashtun, Northern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Pashtun, Northern people is yours.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 434,400 people living in Logar through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Logar, Afghanistan.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Logar, Afghanistan.

location.name: Logar
location.cities_list: Baraki Barak, Pul-e ‘Alam, Charkh, Muḩammad Āghah Wuluswālī, Khōshī
